page.title: 07YEADING LANE
page.content:
Last week we went out on Yeading Lane. We did a traffic survey. We counted the cars and trucks.
It gets busy from 7 am onwards and does not quieten down until 10 pm.
There are houses on both side of the road. There is a Zebra crossing outside our school (Yeading Primary). There is a policeman or lollypop lady at the crossing. Their job is to supervise children and adults crossing the road.
There are many accidents each year on Yeading Lane. People use it as a fast road and forget the 40 mph speed limit.
